衛部秘字第1072161286號通知單註銷密等

CENTRE TO NEWLY ESTABLISHED NATIONAL SALMONELLA CENTRES

1:50 or 1:100 (with 0.25% phenol-salt solution and kept in the refrigerator at 4-5ºC).
